title: Readme
content:
## Source Materials

Place Lorraine Hawkins' curriculum assets (PDF, Markdown, DOCX, or TXT) in this directory before running `npm run ingest`.

Recommended structure:

```
trichology/
└── data/
    └── source-materials/
        ├── trichocare-phase-1/
        │   ├── day-01.md
        │   ├── day-02.md
        │   └── slides.pdf
        └── hair-science-fundamentals/
            └── module-overview.md
```

Files without frontmatter will inherit metadata from their containing folder names. Frontmatter fields that will improve ingestion quality:

```yaml
---
title: Trichocare Phase 1 – Day 01
module: Anatomy Foundations
topics:
  - scalp health
  - consultation
audience: stylist
format: slide-notes
---
```
